content.detailedDescription: So my daughters and i were walking back to my vehicle and i am a star gazer so i happened to look up and tonight has been overcast but i noticed a purple light in the sky now my first thought was that it was a star peaking through the clouds well that was shut down when i notice that the light wss moving then the light changed from purple to a bluish green i started recording and this aircraft started zig zagging across the sky at incredible speeds until it dissappered over the ridgeline
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Moved unlike anything i have ever seen and i was in aviation with the us army

content.detailedDescription: I'd like a call to further better explain my sighting, i was the person to record the video. i was with four family members as well.
content.summary: No sound

content.detailedDescription: When i was about 16,in 1995.I was over at a friends place staying for a weekend,late july. he lived in a rural area west of the city of owen sound ontario canada, near sauble beach ontario.We hadn't seen each other since school ended for the summer.We were hanging out, talking, just doing what friends do etc.We were walking on the side road where he lived it was around 10pm at night. we both seen this strange looking light , down the road probably a mile or so, above the tree top level, we could see the out line of the tree tops form the remaining day light. this object hovered above the distant tree line, but swaying left to right. it had 5 lights the centre light was redish to orange in colour but pulsating, and it had 4 other lights that were in a square around the centre light that were green blue.We watched it for 20-30 seconds, while it swade from left to right.Then the object,moved right towards,us in a blink of a eye. i only really recall the centre light becoming extremely bright, like some one pointing a flash light in your eyes at night.Then in the next moment, i was watching the object swaying left to right above the tree top level down the road, and then it just streeked acrsos the sky, in a north direction and disappeared.My friend and i both looked at one another, and with out a word,both ran back to his house.We went inside his house, in his lower level( the house was a 2 story we were in the lower ground level)we sat on a the couch and after a few moments asked each other " did we see what we just seen". we both described the same lights and rapid movement of the object , not just like a "flash light being shone in your face at night", but how the object just streeked across the sky.One thing, that is the strangest part, is that my friends digital wrist watch , was almost an hour behind the clocks in his house, and he looked at all the clocks in the house even the one on the kitchen stove.They all read 11:20 pm, i thought he was just kidding be he showed me all of them. and from his wrist watch to the clock in his house , i still recall his wrist watch being 10:12 pm, and the clocks in his house reading 11:19pm.We did not discuss what happened,and  went off to bed. the next day after awhile, i asked him about what happened, he said to me we both know what took place, and "as far as i am concerned, nothing happened".Over the years we have drifted apart.Before we went our separate ways in life , so to speak, i would periodically had asked him, do you want to talk about took place that night and he would have nothing to do with it.For me i some times have "flashes " of things i can't explain. things like bright lights, with human like silouhets behind the lights.I had no unexplained scars or bruesing after the event.But am still left wondering, what had really happened.Now some 20 years later i live only but 2 miles south of where the events of 1995, took place ,and have seen some unexplianed things in the nights, or near night sky.As recently as august of this year 2016 i obsereved a clearly passenger jet, passing to the east of my house( we are under neath a flight path from torornto, ontario cananda's pearson airport for north westerly flights. departures and arrivals.) it was about 7:30pm in the evening and the jet outline was plain to see with the naked eye,but was being followed by a bright white light of a bit bigger size , but at the same level and approximately "1 foot", behind the jet(my view point,ground to sky) i have over the years of living here, have see lots of jets pass over head , but have never see one being followed by just a bright light.I can't explian this. or other instances of objects in the sky.I do beleive we are not alone in the universe and that earth has, and will continue to be visited by unearthly craft and or persons.
content.summary: Lights in the sky at night, with strange affects

content.detailedDescription: Friends house checking to see if there were any ufos because people were saying there was in days past, lights fluctuating, a ufo, there's was multiple ufos they were circular and had like rainbow colored lights swirling at high speeds, i was freaking out and was trying to focus the telescope the best i could to get the best view of it, the mosquitos started to get the best of us and we went inside.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Heard about them being in the area and sure enough see different lighting up stars got s telescope out and it was a colorful ball with spinning lights was able to get picture with phone through telescope

content.detailedDescription: I woke up and went to the bathroom and when i was done i walked to the sink to wash my hands. the sink is closer to the window and on my way there i noticed a light that i thought may be ball lightning, moving higher than the tree line at the top of a mountain about a mile away. when i first spotted it the object was already moving slowly in a wave-like pattern just above the tree line. it glowed very light blue, almost white and was very bright. it was oval shaped, i could not make out any details because of the brightness. i felt my hands go numb and i was very scared, almost terrified. i might have held my breath for the duration of the event. i just stood about a foot away from the window watching in awe, frozen on the spot. i lost sight of the object when it spontaneously and instantly sped up to a very high rate of speed and left a line of light the same colour and was gone in a fraction of a second. my information is not real because i do not wish to be contacted, but my siting is real and i wished to report it but don't want to be accused of being insane.
content.summary: Floated up and down in wave like pattern parallel with horizon

content.detailedDescription:
I live in bourget. i am a light sleeper and the slightest noise tend to wake me up. i wake up one night and heard a noise like a helicopter hovering over our house. it was in the middle of the night. i found it peculiar as there is only forest around and not many houses as it is country side.

there seemed to be a light coming from above. looking thru the windows back and front of the house, i didn't saw anything abnormal, just a light haze. the noise and what seemed like a beam of light coming from above, were still present, but i was unable to see what it was.

i went back in my bed and laid down in the darkness. suddenly i saw red lights going under the door, ressembling the red reader light of scanner in a store. i got scared and decided not to move. this movement of lights below the bedroom door continued for some tim, maybe 10 mins. after, the lights disappeared, the noise seemed to get fainter and fainter until it disappeared as well. i was quite petrified.
content.summary: Red lights in the house hovering ufo

content.detailedDescription: In the eastern sky from my outside deck in east rutherford, nj, my fiance and i observed 2 bluish glowing orb like spheres moving across the night sky from left to right. our deck looks eastward at the new york city skyline. one orb was circling the other the entire time. after 20 seconds a plane came into view and the orbs must have been in clear view of the plane's pilot. the flight in our view lasted just less than one minute. this is the second ufo sighting in the last couple years from the same vantage point. this time the orbs were farther away.
content.summary: In the eastern sky from my outside deck my fiance and i observed 2 bluish glowing orb like spheres moving across the night sky from left to right. one orb was circling the other the entire time. the flight in our view lasted just less than one minute.

content.detailedDescription:
In the early hours of saturday, october 1st, 2016, i woke during the early hours of the morning, i noticed it was still dark outside.

when i woke, i was facing away from the doorway, then turned my body around in the direction of our bedroom door, where i saw a "grey" standing there.

the height of the alien would have been over 6 ft, grey in color with black eye's & a slender figure.

he look directly at me, tilted his head to the side and made a movement with his arm, i felt so at peace that i dropped off again.

thankfully there was enough ambient light within the house to get view him clearly.

later that week i attended the doctor's, as i do every week for a scan and treatment, however on this scan, it showed that i'd been exposed to nuclear radiation.

to which, i told my story of my early morning encounter, the weekend prior.
content.summary: Humanoid alien standing within my bedroom doorway.

content.detailedDescription: We were on vacation in florida and i took this picture because of the sunset. after returning home, i noticed what looks to be an alien craft.  maybe you can tell see if it can be explained.
content.summary: Found in my picture

content.detailedDescription: It was today at about 6:35 am in the mourning i was going outside to the bus stop to smoke a cigarette and wait for my daughter to get on the school bus which happens daily but this morning i wanted to see where the sun is coming from i quickly found where and locked my eyes in a dead stir i saw a very huge object about the size of a diamond shaped very white star like object slowing and without noise fly over the woods next to where i live and it came to about maybe a mile away from me lower than 700 ft in the air just come to a stop then go completely black then disappear in thin air with no trace of it in sight no clouds in the sky i went directly in the house and call 911 and told dispatch what i saw and was told to contact the mayor's office or such.....This really ducked me up mental because i saw this very same thing about june of 2013 and this was absolutely the same object..I was scared the first time and definitely upset even more this time because i know what i saw and no one would have seen this because it was as low as an airplane taking off from near by airports that's how close this thing was....
content.summary: I was standing at a bus stop outside my apartment building and was looking at the sky turn bright early in the day i saw what appeared to be a huge glowing white star like object disappear into thin air

content.detailedDescription: I was driving through a neighborhood on my way to the pharmacy.  it was a clear sky with few clouds and a brilliant sunset.  i saw a sparkle in front of me and slightly to the right at about 60 degrees above the horizon.  i first thought it was a plane catching the sunlight, but i then realized that there were no wings! the object was actually sphere-like and it was hovering.  i slowed down to pull over so i could get my smart phone out to take a photo. as soon as i stopped the car, the object took off straight up and out of the atmosphere!  it left no contrail. it had just vanished. as i drove a little further toward my destination, i noticed a small twin engine plane off to my left but that is a usual sight in this area. this metallic sphere reminded me of the object my wife and i witnessed on our way home from work earlier this year on march 1, 2016, as i reported to mufon in case# 74951.
content.summary: Metallic sphere hovers then shoots out of the atmosphere

content.detailedDescription: i took some images a month previous  been looking at the skys lately , thought i may have heard a strange plane leave the airport ,, went outside ten minutes later looked up a seen a object 4000 ft perhaps going over med hat  and not coming from the airport either. quiet dark color left a fast disintegrating trail 2 mins maybe not even no lights. not exactly sure but i think theres planes landing at the airport that can go a little bit faster than normal not too sure but you can hear it i heard a sonic plane take off there last night not a f16 sound  its quicker quieter after it takes of you cant hear it
content.summary: Was looking in there air at midnight , thought i hear a strange plane leave the airport or somethng

content.detailedDescription: Someone texted me ad said it was harvest moon, sent me a image i liked so i wnt to go see if it looked like the image and it never .So i thought i will take a pic to see if i can get the same type image as i was sent and as i put the phone in the air it flew into view    it you can see that it moved and is red in the other image  it needs to be expanded to actually see what it is and it is translusent with windows and very big. i really don't want any one to have these images but what ever i guess.  it was not harvest moon that evening the person who said that was wrong it was on fri day this was on the 14th of sept 2016
content.summary: White light up down erratic  came into view when i pointed  the cell phone in air to take image of moon

content.detailedDescription: It was new years going from 2010 to 2011 and i made a discussion to go home because i had work the next day. i only lived half a mile down the street so i drank my glass of wine and walked home. the time was around 2 o'clock when i made it home and i figured i have a cigarette before heading in. growing up i always looked up into the night sky and tonight it was cold, very quiet and clear. as i looked up i noticed a odd orb of light and thought to myself maybe its mars or something but realized it changed many colors and was far though close. then i noticed another one across the way and then the 3rd one each at a equal distance from one another. i thought to myself maybe its a ufo and laughed at the thought and considered maybe its little home made hot air balloons. then i noticed the complete object was at a tilt and its center was dark negative space with nothing shining through it. stars all around except in this dark triangle shape object which made no sound.  this thing is extremely big and it was heading north west which happens to be the direction of the nuclear power plant.  i looked at it for a few minutes external nervous and scared to even go inside my house to sleep. i was 24 at the time and really did some rational thinking as it happened.  i'm 100% sure i saw something i shouldn't have seen and wish i never did.
content.summary: Large triangle shape with color changing points extremely large in clear night sky with stars out but none in this dark triangle shape at angle

content.detailedDescription: I was standing outside of my house smoking a cigarette when i heard the roar of a low flying loud jet out of nowhere. i looked up and at first could not see anything that could be making that noise. all of the sudden, from over the tree tops, i spotted a very loud low flying small jet airplane. something caught my eye out in front of the airplane, and when i looked up i saw a solid black triangular shaped craft that was solid black with zero lights on it. it was moving in a straight path at a high rate of speed with the airplane fairly close behind chasing the object. the moon was pretty bright that night and the object flew directly through the moon light which gave me a great look at it. it did not have wings, and there were no lights on the object at all - it was a solid black shape. it continued past my house and off into the distance with the airplane following close behind. i watched until they both flew out of my sight, and then just stood there trying to contemplate what i just saw. it definitely was not normal. you could just tell that it wasn't anything that you would see normally flying through the sky. i felt a little uneasy, but also exited about what i just witnessed. it would really be great to know that someone else witnessed this, just for validation, although i know what i saw, at it was not normal at all. thank you for listening and i hope to hear back from someone.
content.summary: Solid black object with no lights at all being chased by jet airplane

content.detailedDescription: while sitting at albert oakland park i noticed a bright light in the sky moving to the northwest. the bright lights stopped above some clouds, and then seem to continue to move to the northwest and a very slow speed. i watched as the object slowly moved out of my line of vision on the horizon, and seem to be high above the clouds as it moved. my only explanation is that it could be a weather balloon.
content.summary: Bright light above clouds, moving slowly to the ne

content.detailedDescription: can someone please contact me.It's urgent. several things are following me every night and early morning. i wasn't telling anyone. i didn't want people to think i was crazy. i've now had no choice but to tell, because now i'm scared. i thought it would go away, it isn't. i have showed friends, family members and now coworkers. the people in my life that i've shared this with are in shock at what they have seen. i believe it is something that i may have started. i will explain when someone gets back to me.
content.summary: It's happening every night and early morning for the past 2 weeks. i need to speak to someone urgent!

content.detailedDescription: I had just parked my car and gotten out with my friend to say good night. i first noticed the objects because i had looked up at the moon which was very bright, but not full moon. the objects were not very bright, they looked to me like flames that changed shape. i told my friend to look up. we stood in the street and watched the small lights move slowly from our right toward our left. my friend and i grabbed our cell phones to record what we were seeing. my friend said he couldn't get good video. my phone worked well. my friend walked ahead of me and was talking to me; i didn't answer back because my phone was so close to my face and i didn't want to record my voice as it may sound too loud. he called out my name and said call the emergency number, which, i am glad to report, i didn't do. the objects gently and slowly moved right to left, in a triangle formation, with the rear object farther away from the two in front. at times, i focused my camera on the object at the rear as it seemed very slightly larger. sometimes it looked round, alternating with a crescent shape. it got brighter when in the crescent shape. i zoomed my camera at this one object, and it looked very round, just like a saucer standing up on end, with a brighter circle in the center. i zoomed back out and then my video recorder timed out. at this time, my friend and i watched the lights "flicker" and then disappear, first the two in front and last, the rear one. i felt excited and happy while this was happening, my friend felt anxious and "a little freaked out" at what we witnessed. we were both very grateful that we saw this amazing phenomenon together. he called emergency number, but the operator was not helpful. he decided to contact mufon today, but i don't know if he has done that yet. i have watched my minute-plus long video many times and it's awesome to see. i'm very glad i recorded it.
content.summary: 3 or more flame-like lights, slow path then hovering, then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
I left work at 8:56 p.M. on oct 13, 2016.  heading ne, i noticed two bright lights peaking in and out of the tree tops slightly to the south of me, but glimpses were fleeting.  about 5 minutes later, i turned nw onto a hilly, windy road, and again, the two orbs stayed in the same spot.  at 9:03, i reached the top of the hill and was able to pull over safely and film it.  at that point they'd been hovering in place for 7 minutes.  i took 4 thirty-to-sixty-second videos before my battery started to run low.  

once i started descending the hill again in my car, i lost sight of them.

the video is jumpy and all you can see are two glowing lights, so i took a print screen and adjusted the brightness and contrast to show the tree line for perspective. (photos attached, video link is below).

https://youtu.Be/pslhq5hkrli
content.summary: Leaving work at 8:56 i noticed two bright lights in the treetops, not moving.  seven minutes later i was on higher ground and able to pull over and film it.

content.detailedDescription: Driving home with co worker, spotted object hovering then it abruptly turned and slowly floated away in opposite direction. i feel it was most certainly a other worldly craft, it was triangle shape with lights on tip and base, we last saw it move behind trees. my feeling during sight was shocked and afterwards disbelief, trying to rationalize what we had seen. debating such things as drones,helicopters,planes and such.. but nothing compared. we noticed object driving because it was clearly visible in front of us..
content.summary: Triangle shape with 3 circular lights at base two at top

content.detailedDescription:
People saw the ufo, near the geneva stadium, about seven guys saw it, from different angles, and they all say the same thing, it was a disc shape ufo that was literraly standing in the air about 30 seconds then disappears in a flashlight. it got four lights on the side. you can view it quite properly on the images and videos. people were stunned and can't believe what they just saw.



sorry for my english...
content.summary: Disc shape ufo with 4 white lights on side, standing in the air and suddenly disappears in a flashlight

content.detailedDescription: She saw the three shapes moving across a blue sky and took the pictures with her cell phone.She said they moved very fast.
content.summary: Daughter saw them and took some cell phone pictures

content.detailedDescription: I was watching tv when my boyfriend called me to the front door to look outside and bring the binoculars. when i came to the door i seen a big bright object in the sky the size of a dinner plate from where i was standing. when looking through the high powered binoculars you could see clearly the round shape of the object and bright colourful flashing lights all around it. while staring at the object i notice a helicopter coming towards the object when it abruptly took off in a very quick straight motion and disappeared. during the whole ordeal we took pictures which came out to look like bright boomerangs in the sky.
content.summary: Looked outside my door grabbed binocular and seen ufo clear as day with lots of coloured lights flashing while it hovered over the st. catherines hospital. then a helicopter came towards it and it abruptly took off

content.detailedDescription: While commuting in rush hour traffic in noticed a pretty rain bow in the clouds and decided to take a picture. however after the first picture i noticed that i didn't catch a rainbow but a blue orb. a few miles down the highway i noticed another rainbow and i captured that and what i saw was a face that resembled queen nefertiti . closer to maryland i saw the rainbow again and that's when i noticed the blue orb was there again .
content.summary: blue orbs

content.detailedDescription: I went outside to take the dogs pee and there they were. flying from my left to right in a silent formation. i went back inside to grab my phone and started taking pics and filming. bright orange orbs bigger than a c130military planes.I yelled to my wife ,she was very afraid. im 49 years old with nothing to gain by making this report. i believe people need to know the truth. thank goodness for the people at mufon.Feel free to contact me with with email address and i will send you my photos. can't seem to use my multi media with this website. thanx for reading.
content.summary: I have video and photos , i am a very clear and calm individual. i know what i saw. these were massive ufos

content.detailedDescription: This happened years ago when i was on my way to work heading towards craftmaid cabinet factory in orwell ohio. i had been working there through a temp service for almost 3 months. i was on the highway and was approching a bridge ahead of the bridge i saw a big black triangle craft with white lights in each corner and one red in the center. it was big enough and close enough that it blocked the sky out as i approached it. it was just siting there hovering probably only about 100 feet above the trees and took up both sides of the highway. when i looked up as i drove under it the red light was right above me i have never seen anything like it. then i remember looking in my rearview mirror and it moved off to the right very slowly and when i tried to look back again it was gone. the weirdest part that bothers me to this day is that i could not remember where i was. i knew i was trying to get to work but all the sudden had no clue where i was and i had drove this route by memory for almost 90 days. i ended up getting off a wrong exit and got back on the highway trying to figure out how to get back home. i finally saw a sign that said youngstown which was kinda by where i lived in warren so i got off there and found my way back home and never went back to work there. i was staying with my father at the time and knew i couldnt tell him that so i told him that i was let go from the job through the temp service. to this day i have no idea how i could have forgot how to get to work it was like i felt funny and couldnt make a clear thought. ive came to this website before but could never bring myself to fill this out but i think i just want people to know and maybe somone knows what it was. thank you, matthew peigowski.
content.summary: On the highway i saw and drove uder a huge black triangle.Had 3 white lights and one red in center.Forgot how to get to work.

content.detailedDescription: Hello, i sent you some photos i took a few days ago, i was taking photos to sunrise, and i didnt know was something rare in one.It was in azua, dominican republic. 06:00 am.
content.summary: I took a photo.

content.detailedDescription: My daughters & i were pulling into walmart in belmont north carolina.. she asked me "daddy what is that thing in the sky?" i said "where" she said "right there".... it took me a minute to see it bc it was almost level with the sunset & it hurt my eyes.. then i seen it, seemingly thought it was a blimp but it would move in & out of sight, disappearing & reappearing rapidly several times... so one of my twin girls said "there it is, i see it daddy." then it disappeared again, but then it reappeared just as before. i got the attention of someone who thought i was crazy bc i said i was watching a ufo & i wanted them to see for themselves, suddenly when i was pointing, an extremely small, bright light (bright but not hurting my eyes kind of light) started moving from one side from left to right from our perspective, gradually getting bigger as it approached the middle of the craft & smaller as it move toward the other side... then it disappeared... then my daughter said "daddy, i see it!!! oh daddy there is 2." then it disappeared again!!!
content.summary: Daughter noticed metallic object over walmart near direction of sun.. disappeared then 2 reappeared.  no cloud cover w 1 pulsar like light from right to left 1 time

content.detailedDescription: It is 7:00am in the morning. i woke up as usual. i noticed that my window was open at the time. fresh air was coming in and i decided 10 minutes won't waste that much time, so i took the opportunity. i am a strong believer in extra-terrestrials, and i loved to see one myself, but for now i always watch the skies for how beautiful it is. night and morning were the best times. i look out the window and lay there smelling the fresh air and admiring the bright blue sky. during those moments, i thought about our universe and about the beings that watched over us, if they were even real or not. to the corner of my eye, a flash of light that lasted less then a second appears in the sky. i saw no planes or any flying machinery in the air when these toke place. nothing made those lights i saw. a couple minutes later, another one appears, farther away from the other one. i am getting really concerned about the flashes of lights and where they were coming from. other airplanes go by in the mean time. 45 seconds later, this object appears in the sky. my brain thought that i missed it flying in but no. one thing that stood out of it was how it glided across the sky so smoothly in such a straight line! i stared at the object from a really far distance and noticed how it was gray and round. it spun and reflected the light of the sun off its surface really brightly. this object appeared between the two flashes of lights, but more closer to the first one. i followed it and had no access to my phones at the moment. it traveled behind the very top branch of the tallest tree i saw and disappeared not to be seen again. to my concern, i think the ufo traveled above an electric railway system. i knew it was a ufo based on it making no sound so close and it not being in the shape of an airplane or a bird.
content.summary: Two flashes of light appeared in the sky. one then theother separated and shown at different times. a ufo appears between these two lights.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in the house. i have a body through the sky bright. i output balcony. i save and video. kites be called body light before thought. because there seemed to queue. kites shines i ind. frequent loss after body that, back is, that color change around that any black body of i sees through black out bodies. then i noticed that the place de light cýsmým ol. and around the ray he had gezen. i sees and sea ray of moving on de. he would cling on black sea industry bodies.Video recording a difference before you begin approximately 5 minutes light i have the last 31 seconds before the cýsmý.Kaybol could save video. lost and latest he did not seem to be afraid again. i ended the bender camera registration.
content.summary: I saw the light in the air day body is.He was always getting lost and going.
